description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Windows Common Log File System Driver leading to potential elevation of privileges. This flaw allows local attackers to exploit memory management flaws, resulting in unauthorized access to kernel resources. Affected products include various Windows builds: 10.0.19045.4412, 10.0.22631.3593, and others, as documented in KB-5037788, KB-5037771, KB-5037770, and KB-5037768.
